title: Lindsay Pettingill: Airbnb's 4 Principles For Marketing Experimentation
itunes:author: John Bonini
itunes:summary: Airbnb runs about 700 experiments in a given week. Here, I chat with data scientist Linsday Pettingill on the culture and principles that allow their team to move so quickly and efficiently, and how others people can transpose these ideas to their own work.
itunes:subtitle: Airbnb runs about 700 experiments in a given weekâ€¦
